# THIS FILE HAS BEEN GENERATED BY THE BUILD CONFIGURATION SYSTEM - DO NOT EDIT

set(MINECPP_SCHEMA_COMPILER_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})

add_executable(minecpp_schema_compiler)

# Public include headers
target_include_directories(minecpp_schema_compiler
  PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include
  PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include/minecpp/schema_compiler
)

# Source subdirectory
add_subdirectory("src")

target_link_libraries(minecpp_schema_compiler
        LINK_PRIVATE
        minecpp_nbt
        minecpp_lexer
        libmb
        fmt
        libmb_codegen
        Boost::program_options
)

add_subdirectory("example/nbt_generator")
